content:
FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/ci.yml
DIR_STATE:[".github/workflows/ci.yml"]
Summary: Added a minimal GitHub Actions CI workflow that installs dependencies, runs the CI runner, hard-fails on missing reports/figures outputs, and uploads runtime/_build as an artifact.
